Impulse

This tool converts your BungeeCord config.yml file into a velocity.toml file.

Here's your converted velocity.toml file. You will need to tweak Velocity specific settings such as player info forwarding. Note permissions are not natively suported by Velocity. Instead, you will need a plugin such as LuckPerms.

Check out Velocity's documentation for more details about each setting. You can also ask on any official communication channels.
